alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 1:16PM AKST until January 04 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta Coast. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Large snow drifts can form. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A prolonged period of stormy conditions with strong winds and blowing snow is likely for much of next week.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
